name: R5-Organization-R4-Organization
title: Concept map to convert a FHIR R5 Organization into FHIR R4

element.display: A grouping of people or organizations with a common purpose

target.display: A grouping of people or organizations with a common purpose
target.comment: R5 `Organization` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Organization`

element.display: Whether the organization's record is still in active use

target.display: Whether the organization's record is still in active use
target.comment: R5 `Organization.active` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Organization.active`

element.display: A list of alternate names that the organization is known as, or was known as in the past

target.display: A list of alternate names that the organization is known as, or was known as in the past
target.comment: R5 `Organization.alias` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Organization.alias`

element.display: Official contact details for the Organization

target.display: Contact for the organization for a certain purpose
target.comment: R5 `Organization.contact` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `Organization.contact` - contact has change due to type change: R5 contact ExtendedContactDetail has no equivalent or mapped type in R4 contact

element.display: Contained, inline Resources

target.comment: R5 `Organization.contained` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Organization.contained`

element.display: Additional details about the Organization that could be displayed as further information to identify the Organization beyond its name
Technical endpoints providing access to services operated for the organization

target.display: Technical endpoints providing access to services operated for the organization
target.comment: R5 `Organization.endpoint` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Organization.endpoint`

element.display: Additional content defined by implementations

target.comment: R5 `Organization.extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `Organization.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R5 `extension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `extension`

element.display: Logical id of this artifact

target.comment: R5 `Organization.id` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Organization.id`

element.display: Identifies this organization  across multiple systems

target.display: Identifies this organization  across multiple systems
target.comment: R5 `Organization.identifier` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Organization.identifier`

element.display: A set of rules under which this content was created

target.display: A set of rules under which this content was created
target.comment: R5 `Organization.implicitRules` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Organization.implicitRules`

element.display: Language of the resource content

target.comment: R5 `Organization.language` maps as SourceIsNarrowerThanTarget to R4 `Organization.language` - language changed the binding strength from Required to Preferred; language has change due to type change: R5 `language` `code` maps as SourceIsNarrowerThanTarget for R4 `language`

element.display: Metadata about the resource

target.comment: R5 `Organization.meta` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Organization.meta`

element.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored

target.comment: R5 `Organization.modifierExtension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `Organization.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R5 `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `modifierExtension`

element.display: Name used for the organization

target.comment: R5 `Organization.name` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Organization.name`

element.display: The organization of which this organization forms a part

target.display: The organization of which this organization forms a part
target.comment: R5 `Organization.partOf` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Organization.partOf`

element.display: Qualifications, certifications, accreditations, licenses, training, etc. pertaining to the provision of care
Coded representation of the qualification
Additional content defined by implementations
Unique id for inter-element referencing
An identifier for this qualification for the organization
Organization that regulates and issues the qualification
Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized
Period during which the qualification is valid
Text summary of the resource, for human interpretation

target.display: Text summary of the resource, for human interpretation
target.comment: R5 `Organization.text` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Organization.text`

element.display: Kind of organization

target.comment: R5 `Organization.type` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Organization.type`
